title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes

title: Updating Payment Information
content:
To update payment methods:
1. Go to 'My Account' > 'Billing'.
2. Select 'Update Payment Method'.
3. Enter new card details and save.
If a payment fails, the system retries 3 times before suspending the account.

title: Premium Tier Benefits
content:
The Premium Tier includes:
- Unlimited monthly experiences (vs 4 in Basic)
- Priority booking for high-demand events
- Exclusive access to 'Meet the Artist' sessions
- No cancellation fees for reservations cancelled 24h in advance.

title: Family Plan Options
content: CultPass does not currently offer a specific Family Plan. Each adult must have their own individual subscription. However, children under 12 often enter free at partner venues (check specific venue details).

title: Refund Policy for Paid Events
content:
For premium events with an extra fee:
- 100% refund if cancelled > 48 hours before start.
- 50% refund if cancelled 24-48 hours before.
- No refund if cancelled < 24 hours before.
Refunds are processed to the original payment method within 5-7 business days.

title: App Crashing or Slow Performance
content:
If the app is buggy:
1. Ensure the app is updated to the latest version via App Store/Play Store.
2. Clear app cache (Android) or reinstall (iOS).
3. Check internet connection.
If issues persist, ask for the device model and OS version to file a technical ticket.

title: Gift Cards and Vouchers
content:
To redeem a Gift Card:
1. Go to 'Settings' > 'Redeem Code'.
2. Enter the 12-digit alphanumeric code.
The value will be applied as credit towards subscription fees or premium events.

title: Account Suspension Reasons
content:
Accounts may be suspended for:
- Non-payment of subscription fees.
- Repeated 'No-Shows' (reserving but not attending) more than 3 times a month without cancellation.
- Violation of venue codes of conduct.

title: Changing User Profile Name
content: Users can change their display name in 'My Account' > 'Profile'. However, for security reasons, the email address cannot be changed in the app. They must contact support to migrate an account to a new email.

title: Offline Access
content: The CultPass app requires an active internet connection to browse and reserve. However, booked tickets/QR codes are saved locally and can be accessed offline at the venue entrance.

title: Partnership Inquiries
content:
If a venue or artist wants to partner with CultPass:
Do not handle in support. Direct them to email partners@cultpass.com with their portfolio and venue details.

title: Accessibility Information
content: Venue accessibility varies. In the app, look for the 'Wheelchair Icon' on event pages. We strive to only partner with accessible venues, but users should verify specific needs in the event description.
